items.title: US designates Colombia as country 'failing to cooperate in drug war'
items.description: For the first time in almost three decades Colombia loses its certification as a US ally in the war on drugs.

items.title: Malawians await presidential poll result in vote dominated by economic woes
items.description: If no candidate wins more than half the votes, the top two contenders will head to a run-off.

items.title: What is at stake in Malawi's elections as cost-of-living bites?
items.description: Campaigns were overshadowed by price rises and fuel shortages.

items.title: Acting legend Robert Redford dies aged 89
items.description: The acting star was famous for roles in The Sting and Butch Cassidy and the Sundance Kid.

items.title: Watch: Bear caught on CCTV searching for food in Indian temple
items.description: The curious creature ransacked an office in its quest to find tasty treats.
